models module¶

class entity.models.Contact(**kwargs)¶

Bases: Base

This class represents a contact associated with a user.

Attributes: id (int): The unique identifier of the contact. name (str): The name of the contact. surename (str): The surename of the contact. email (str): The email of the contact. phone_number (str): The phone number of the contact. birthday (Date): The birthday of the contact. other_info (str): Additional information about the contact. owner_id (int): The id of the user who owns this contact. owner (User): The user who owns this contact.

Methods: None

surename¶
class entity.models.User(**kwargs)¶

Bases: Base

This class represents a user in the application.

Attributes: id (int): The unique identifier of the user. email (str): The email of the user. username (str): The username of the user. password (str): The password of the user. avatar (str): The avatar of the user. confirmed (bool): Indicates whether the user’s email is confirmed. is_active (bool): Indicates whether the user is active. contacts (list): A list of contacts associated with the user.

Methods: None
